title: Spear of Night
content:
Spear of Night Rare 2~9 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+1 Piercing Shar's Blessing: If Shar allows it, use this spear to kill Nightsong. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: There is an eager, annihilating darkness thrumming within this weapon - it begs to be used. Spear Thrown Versatile 1.35 190

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6)+1 Piercing

Shar's Blessing: If Shar allows it, use this spear to kill Nightsong.
